p: The risk of T. pallidum infection was high in the rural area of southwestern China, and was significantly associated with spouse having syphilis, drug abuse, blood transfusion and HBV and HCV infections. The correlates of T. pallidum infection varied in males and females. It is vital to implement comprehensive and effective intervention programs to reduce the risk of T. pallidum transmission and to achieve adequate access to syphilis treatment, especially for people who are IDUs and their spouses.
